title: Google Maps Search
description: Search for businesses on Google Maps with a simple query.

query.title: Search Query
query.description: What to search for (e.g., 'restaurants in NYC', 'coffee shops', 'plumber')

hl.title: Language (HL)
hl.description: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'es', 'fr' or with region 'en-US', 'de-DE')

gl.title: Region (GL)
gl.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for region-specific results (e.g., 'us', 'de', 'fr', 'uk')

use_cache.title: Use Cache
use_cache.description: Use cached results if available to reduce costs and speed up results

maximum_cache_age.title: Maximum Cache Age (seconds)
maximum_cache_age.description: Maximum age of cached results in seconds. Set to 0 to always fetch fresh data.
